name: Conquer or Die
description:
Can you defeat the onslaught and conquer the dungeon?

Build your own deck from an array of mystical cards to defeat the forces of evil. Explore the secrets of the sequentially generated dungeon in your goal of defeating the overlord. Visit merchants along the way to buy new cards and upgrades. In the dungeon you only have one shot; you will conquer or die.

Key features:

  • 19 unique cards to collect to shape your playstyle and strategy.
  • 10 different enemies with their own attack patterns and AI.
  • Sequentially generated dungeon that ensures each playthrough is a unique challenge.
  • 'New game plus' features allow you to keep playing if you manage to beat the overlord.

Should support windows, mac and linux.
